Scale

# Scale

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class               | Support        |
| ------------------- | -------------- |
| ```
scale-{n}
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
scale-[n]
```   | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
scale-x-{n}
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
scale-x-[n]
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
scale-y-{n}
``` | ✅ Full Support |
| ```
scale-y-[n]
``` | ✅ Full Support |
